name: Platforming Under Pressure
description:
Controls:

Space: start/stop simulation

Escape: open pause menu

WASD: pan camera

Shift: increase camera pan speed

Scroll Wheel: change pressure (when hovering over valve)

Created By:

Brett Schumacher

Michael Boschwitz

Noelle Feist

Have you already played through the game and wish it was a bit harder? Try completing it again with the following restrictions:

Spring: Only use 2 pipes and 2 platforms - EXTREME: 1 pipe and 1 valve

Summer: Only use 1 pipe, 1 platform, and 1 valve - EXTREME: 1 pipe and 1 valve

Fall: Complete 2 pipes 1 see-saw - EXTREME: 2 pipes no see-saws

Winter: Only use 2 pipes and 2 valves - EXTREME: 1 pipe and 1 valve

More In-depth Credits are available in the Game Build.zip 

Download the Zip for a more stable experience!
